title: Mississippi National River & Recreation Area: Virtual Tour
body: Virtual Tour       Experience the Mississippi River virtually through panoramas and Google Earth boundaries.  Panoramas Panoramic images allow viewers a 360 degree viewpoint of sites within the Mississippi River corridor.  Move from left to right and view the site as if you were standing there. Flash Player is required to view the panoramas.  Coon Rapids Dam (1.1mb) Harriet Island (2.0mb) Mill Ruins Park (1mb) Nicollet Island (1.8mb) St. Anthony Falls (1.9mb) St. Paul Brickyards (1.7mb) Stone Arch Bridge (1.3mb) Google Earth Left-click and open Park Boundary & Mississippi River Visitor Center with Google Earth or right-click and “Save As…”.
